title: Great Falls Park: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 14 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Great Falls Park Centennial Jr Ranger Program      Time: 3:00 PM to 5:00 PM Location: Visitor Center Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Every Sunday Weekly  from 06/05/2016 to 08/28/2016 Earn your Centennial Junior Ranger Badge during this two hour ranger led program. You will explore what makes Great Falls Park a great National Park and discover it's shared connection to other National Park Service sites. View Details      Great Falls Park Falls Walk      Time: 1:00 PM to 1:30 PM Location: Visitor Center Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Everyday  from 05/01/2016 to 08/31/2016 Join a Ranger for a fun 30 minute stroll along the stunning vistas of Great Falls. Explore the natural and historical features of Great Falls that make this a  timeless wonder.   View Details      Great Falls Park Falls Walk Weekends      Time: 11:00 AM to 11:30 PM Location: Visitor Center Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Every Sunday Weekly & Every Saturday Weekly  from 06/04/2016 to 08/28/2016 Join a Ranger for a fun 30 minute stroll along the stunning vistas of Great Falls. Explore the natural and historical features of Great Falls that make this a timeless wonder. View Details      Great Falls Park Flat Hat Chat      Time: 1:30 PM to 1:45 PM,3:30 PM to 3:45 PM Location: Overlook 3 Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Everyday  from 05/01/2016 to 08/31/2016 Drop in and join a Park Ranger at Overlook 3 View Details      Great Falls Park Visitor Center Museum      Time: 10:00 AM to 5:00 PM Location: Great Falls Park Visitor Center Fees: free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Everyday  from 04/23/2016 to 10/31/2016 A great place to start your adventures at Great Falls Park. View Details      Great Falls Park Discovery Hike      Time: 2:00 PM to 3:00 PM Location: Visitor Center Fees: Free     Tuesday, August 16, 2016 Have you ever wanted to explore the park beyond the falls overlooks?  Join a park ranger to explore a gorge, a canal, and the Potomac River.   Meet the ranger at the Visitor Center desk. View Details      Great Falls Park Centennial Jr Ranger Program      Time: 1:00 PM to 3:00 PM Location: Great Falls Park VA Fees: Free     Wednesday, August 17, 2016 Every Wednesday Weekly  from 06/01/2016 to 08/31/2016 Earn your Centennial Junior Ranger Badge during this two hour ranger led program. You will explore what makes Great Falls Park a great National Park and discover it's shared connection to other National Park Service sites. View Details      Great Falls Park America's Best Idea      Time: 2:00 PM to 2:45 PM Location: Visitor Center Fees: Free     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Explore Great Falls Park with a ranger, and learn about the significance of National Parks and why they hold a special place in our hearts. View Details      Great Falls Park In the Footsteps of George Washington      Time: 11:30 PM to 12:30 PM Location: Visitor Center Fees: Free     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Every Saturday Weekly  from 06/04/2016 to 08/27/2016 Join a ranger for a walk along the scenic and historic Potowmack Canal, one of America's first waterways to the west. George Washington's dream canal is considered to be America's greatest engineering achievement of the 18th century. View Details      Great Falls Park Learn to Ride      Time: 9:45 AM to 12:00 PM Location: Turkey Run Park     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Join a park ranger who can teach your child how to ride a bicycle in this free program.  Note: location is at Turkey Run Park.  Learn to Ride introduces an effective and low-stress way to learn to ride a bicycle.  RESERVATIONS REQUIRED VIA EMAIL View Details      Great Falls Park FLOODS! The Power of the Potomac      Time: 2:30 PM to 3:30 PM Location: Overlook 3 Fees: Free     Sunday, August 21, 2016 Join a ranger for a hike down the river trail to see what happens during floods. View Details      Great Falls Park Snakes Alive      Time: 2:00 PM to 2:30 PM Location: Visitor Center Fees: Free     Sunday, August 21, 2016 Hey there reptile fans? Have you ever touched a snake or are you terrified of snakes? Find out some answers to your scaly questions, explore the interesting habits and characteristics of snakes, and over come your fears.  View Details      Great Falls Park "2016 Fee Free Days"      Location: Great Falls Park, Virginia Fees: FREE ADMISSION     Thursday, August 25, 2016 National Park Service "Fee Free Days" in 2015 View Details      Great Falls Park A Brass Ring Memory      Time: 2:00 PM to 3:00 PM Location: Visitor Center Fees: Free     Sunday, August 28, 2016 Not so long ago, people came to Great Falls by trolley, viewed the river from a tower, and danced to live orchestra music.  Join a ranger to catch a glimpse of Great Falls' romantic past. View Details                              Sites along the George Washington Memorial Parkway programs and special events.  George Washington Memorial Parkway- schedule for the Netherlands Carillon, Dyke Marsh, Fort Hunt, Theodore Roosevelt Island, and the Mount Vernon Trail.
